## About me

I am a geographer interested in climate, conservation, energy and transportation-related topics. I specialize in geodata analysis, GIS and remote sensing. For geospatial work, I use `r fontawesome::fa(name = "r-project", fill = "steelblue")` as well as traditional GIS. I am currently seeking employment.

## Projects I've worked on

Master's thesis in [Project LiMeS](https://www.iee.fraunhofer.de/de/projekte/suche/laufende/LiMeS.html) (German only) at [Fraunhofer IEE](https://www.iee.fraunhofer.de/en.html)

[GeoAI](https://geomoer.github.io/geoAI/) & [The Mountain Exile Hypothesis](https://www.uni-marburg.de/en/fb19/dfg2358) in the [Environmental Informatics](https://www.uni-marburg.de/en/fb19/disciplines/physisch/environmentalinformatics) lab of Philipps University of Marburg

## Education

**M.Sc. in Physical Geography** from Philipps University of Marburg, DE

**B.A. in History & German** from UNC-Chapel Hill, USA
